== Saligao (CT) (626696) ==

Saligao (CT) is a town in the [[BARDEZ 002]] taluka of [[NORTH GOA]] district with an area of 5.86 sq. km. and harbouring 1512 households with total population of 6280 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 10 km. The state headquarter [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 10 km. Male population is 3175 and female population is 3105. Scheduled Caste population is 49 and Scheduled Tribes population is 80. Census Location Code of the town is 626696<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (population_total 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is BELGAUM at a distance of 176 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is PUNE at a distance of 471 km. Railway station is at TIVIM at a distance of 11 km.

== Sanitation and Drinking Water ==  
The town has open and closed drainage system.
Water is supplied from a service reservoir. The town gets it water as tap water from a treated source. The capacity of the water supply system is 5000 kilo-litres.

The nearest fire fighting service is at MAPUSA (5 km) .
